jumpDrawablesToCurrentState().Description: Call @B_android#graphics#drawable#Drawable#jumpToCurrentState_E@ on all Drawable objects associated with this view. Also calls @B_android#animation#StateListAnimator#jumpToCurrentState_E@ if there is a StateListAnimator attached to this view.

Parameters: Canvas: the canvas on which the background will be drawn
onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas).Description: Implement this to do your drawing.

drawableStateChanged().Description: This function is called whenever the state of the view changes in such a way that it impacts the state of drawables being shown. If the View has a StateListAnimator, it will also be called to run necessary state change animations. Be sure to call through to the superclass when overriding this function.

ClassDesc: A https:##developer#android#com@B_android#widget#SeekBar_E@ which supports compatible features on older versions of the platform. This will automatically be used when you use https:##developer#android#com@B_android#widget#SeekBar_E@ in your layouts and the top-level activity / dialog is provided by
